purpose.p: Declaration, available only in a schema-aware processor that identifies a schema defining the user-defined types, element and attributes.

usage.p: Schema modules that are imported or included in the referenced schema must be explicitly declared if those definitions are required.
This element may include an inline XML schema, in which case the schema-location attribute must not be used.

property.name: namespace
property.description: The namespace URI of the schema to be imported. This information may be enough on its own to enable an implementation to locate the required schema components.

property.name: schema-location
property.description: Indicates where the schema document is located. It is likely that a schema-aware XSLT processor will be able to process a schema document found at this location.
